message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $95?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. After reviewing your offer, I understand your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs while still valuing our product's quality, I propose a price of $100 for the product. This offers a compromise that respects both our business interests and your financial considerations.
